message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is still too high. I could meet you halfway at $16,500. This is my final offer.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $16,000 for the product.
